data.name: Devilian - Nightmare Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become the embodiment of a living nightmare with this devilish pack of goods, designed to let every Devilian unleash their true potential. Stacks of talismans, mountains of resistance materials, Patron time, blessings, tears, a ferocious bear mount, and much more await!

30-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

750 Credits

Get even more items in the Devilian in-game store!

30 Enigma Keys

Unlock Enigma Boxes and claim the treasures within

Ethereal Ursus Mount

Ride a ferocious bear into battle

3x 7-day Elara's Blessings

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

3x 7-day Bolton's Blessings

Earn 25% more Gold

3x 7-day Aira's Blessings

Get better drops in Infinite Hunting Grounds

10 Gemmed Talisman Boxes

Grants a Rare, Heroic, or Legendary Talisman when opened

10 Glowing Sacrificial Talisman Boxes

Grants Sacrificial Talismans when opened

15 Archdevil Dungeon Reentry Tickets

Reset your Archdevil Dungeon entry count

3 Essence Core Boxes

Grants items used to increase your Tier 6 and 7 resistances

5 Essence Crystal Boxes

Grants items used to increase your Tier 4 and 5 resistances

10 Ael's Tears

Use to upgrade Artifacts

8 Ael's Tears (Pure)

Use to upgrade Artifacts

8 Kavel's Tears

Use to upgrade Artifacts

Furious Jirah Talisman

Earn 5% more XP and 2.5% more Gold in Dungeons

Benevolent Tempera Talisman

Earn 10% more XP and Gold in the Abyssal Tower

Sharpshooter Darius Talisman

Gain +5% Devilian Penetration and +1.8% Devilian Life Absorb

data.short_description: Become the embodiment of a living nightmare with this devilish pack of goods, designed to let every Devilian unleash their true potential. Stacks of talismans, mountains of resistance materials, Patron time, blessings, tears, a ferocious bear mount, and much more await!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
